item.title: The Effective Altruism Handbook
item.description: Avalaible online at effective-altruism.com (pdf) Notes I. What is Effective Altruism? Effective altruism is a growing community based around the idea of aiming to do the most good that one can. It involves: Being open to all the possible ways to do good and pursuing the path with the biggest positive impact; Using evidence to figure out how to do the most good; and Choosing to make altruism a significant part of one’s life.

item.title: About
item.description: I live in Cracow, Poland and I work as security engineer at Base. I try to better understand world around me and I fail miserably. But everyday I am better at failing. Contact I’ll be happy to chat with you, drop me an email at ecneladis@gmail.com. You can find me on Twitter, Github, Instagram and LinkedIn. Copyright © Michal Marek 2017
